languages.text: [Дать подробные распоряжения о переоборудовании "Бессердечного"] "Этот корабль станет частью моего личного флота и будет защищать флагман".
[Give detailed instructions on how the Heartless should be refitted] "The vessel in question will join my personal fleet and protect the dynasty flagship."

languages.text: [详细说明应当如何对无心号进行改装]“这艘船修好之后就加入我的私人舰队，负责守护王朝旗舰。”
languages.original_text: [Give detailed instructions on how the Heartless should be refitted] "The vessel in question will join my personal fleet and protect the dynasty flagship."

traits.locale_text: [详细说明应当如何对无心号进行改装]“这艘船修好之后就加入我的私人舰队，负责守护王朝旗舰。”

languages.text: [ハートレスの改装方法について詳しい指示を与える]「対象の船は{mf|俺|私}の私設艦隊に編入されて、王朝の旗艦を護衛することになる」
languages.original_text: [Give detailed instructions on how the Heartless should be refitted] "The vessel in question will join my personal fleet and protect the dynasty flagship."

languages.text: [Dar instrucciones detalladas sobre las modificaciones de la Desalmada] «La nave en cuestión se unirá a mi flota personal para proteger la nave insignia de la dinastía».
languages.original_text: [Give detailed instructions on how the Heartless should be refitted] "The vessel in question will join my personal fleet and protect the dynasty flagship."

traits.locale_text: [Dar instrucciones detalladas sobre las modificaciones de la Desalmada] «La nave en cuestión se unirá a mi flota personal para proteger la nave insignia de la dinastía».

languages.text: [Detaillierte Anweisungen geben, wie die Heartless neu ausgestattet werden soll] "Das fragliche Schiff wird sich meiner persönlichen Flotte anschließen und das Flaggschiff der Dynastie beschützen."
languages.original_text: [Give detailed instructions on how the Heartless should be refitted] "The vessel in question will join my personal fleet and protect the dynasty flagship."

languages.text: [Taşkalp'in nasıl ıslah edileceğine dair ayrıntılı talimat ver] "Söz konusu gemi, hanedanlığın sancak gemisini korumak üzere kişisel filoma dâhil olacak."
languages.original_text: [Give detailed instructions on how the Heartless should be refitted] "The vessel in question will join my personal fleet and protect the dynasty flagship."

languages.text: [Donner des instructions précises sur la restauration du Sans-Cœur] « Ce vaisseau rejoindra ma flotte personnelle pour protéger le navire amiral de la dynastie. »
